```{r}

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(pracma)
library(sp)
library(rgdal)

load("data_short.RData")

lnd <- readOGR(dsn = "map_data", layer = "london_sport")
lnd_f <- broom::tidy(lnd)

```
```{r}

data_shorter <- data_short %>% filter(price_pp <= 75)

data_shorter <- data_shorter %>% arrange(price_pp)

map <- ggplot() +
  geom_polygon(data = lnd_f, aes(long, lat, group = group), fill = "grey95", color = "grey32") +
  geom_point(data = data_shorter, aes(east, north, color = price_pp), alpha = 0.5, size = 1) +
  labs(x = 'Easting', y = 'Northing') +
  coord_equal() + theme_minimal() + scale_colour_gradientn(colours = terrain.colors(60))


map

```
